fixes.name: Selected Year Filter
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped YEAR([TransactionDate]) to YEAR('accounts+'[TransactionDate]) and replaced the Tableau parameter [Parameters].[Select Year] with SELECTEDVALUE('Select Year'[Display As]) as required by the parameter mapping rules. The equality operator is preserved.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
